findcmake

find CMake path.

Syntax

[status, cmake_path] = findcmake()

Output argument

status

a logical.

cmake_path

a string: path of CMake or ''.

Description

find CMake path.

CMake is used internaly to generate makefiles used to build dynamic libraries on fly.

See also

cmake.

Example

[status, cmake_path] = findcmake()

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
